projects.title: Shopify Fashion Store - Luxe Boutique
projects.description: Designed and developed a fully custom Shopify theme for a luxury fashion boutique. Integrated advanced filtering, size guides, wishlist functionality, and seamless checkout experience.
projects.fullDescription: Created a high-converting Shopify store with custom theme development using Liquid, JavaScript, and CSS. Implemented product recommendations, Instagram feed integration, advanced search with filtering by size/color/price, multi-currency support, and mobile-first responsive design. Achieved 40% increase in conversion rates.

projects.title: E-commerce Website - Full Stack
